DDG Email Panel respects your privacy: DDG Email Panel is the open source DuckDuckGo Email Protection panel and is not officially owned by DuckDuckGo, but we still respect your privacy and do not store or sell any personal information
DDG Email Introduction: DDG Email Panel is the open source unofficial DuckDuckGo Email Protection panel.
login tip: To get started, please login first
No Duck Address: No Duck Address? Go to Sign Up!
Duck Address can only contain letters an: Duck Address can only contain letters and numbers!
DuckDuckGo One-time Passphrase has been: DuckDuckGo One-time Passphrase has been sent to your email address, please enter it below and continue!
Unauthorized: One-time Passphrase does not match or has expired, please try again.
For untrusted websites, Privacy Duck Add: For untrusted websites, Privacy Duck Addresses can hide your email identity.
How to obtain a Token: How to get Access Token (API Token)
The access token cannot generate an alia: The Access Token cannot generate an alias, please check whether it is valid
